query.statement:
SELECT M12.NAME1 ,T.PSPID ,T.POSID ,M2.POSID_OLD ,M1.ZSITE_NM ,M2.ZSPEC1 ,M2.ZSPEC2 ,M2.NAMET2 ,(SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT028 AS M28 WHERE M28.MANDT = T.MANDT AND M28.CODE1 = 'PS003' AND M28.CODE2 = M2.ZZACTSS) AS ZZACTSS ,T.GUBUN ,T.TOT ,B_PRO_R ,A_PRO_R ,T.PRO_R ,ROUND(T.TOT*A_PRO_R/100,0) AS AMT ,T.CRDAT ,CASE WHEN M2.ZQEGEMSA = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE M2.ZQEGEMSA END ZQEGEMSA ,CASE WHEN M2.ZBEPJEO = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE M2.ZBEPJEO END ZBEPJEO ,CASE WHEN M2.ZBOSUOUT = '00000000' THEN '' ELSE M2.ZBOSUOUT END ZBOSUOUT FROM ( SELECT T1.MANDT,T1.PSPID ,T1.POSID ,T1.LIFNR ,T1.GUBUN ,T3.TOT ,VALUE(T2.B_PRO_R,0) B_PRO_R ,T1.PRO_R - VALUE(T2.B_PRO_R,0) AS A_PRO_R ,T1.PRO_R ,T1.CRDAT FROM ( -- =============================== À±Ã¶ÁßBJN ¿äÃ» Äõ¸® Æ©´× 1 ============================================ SELECT P.MANDT , P.PSPID , P.POSID , P.GUBUN -- , SUM(PRO_R) AS PRO_R , VALUE( (SELECT SUM(X.PRO_R) FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0112 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = P.MANDT AND X.PSPID = P.PSPID AND X.POSID = P.POSID AND X.CRDAT <= #CRDAT#), 0) AS PRO_R , M.LIFNR , MAX(P.CRDAT) CRDAT FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0112 AS P,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS M WHERE P.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND P.MANDT = M.MANDT AND P.PSPID = M.POSID AND P.POSID = M.POSID_1
AND M.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
AND M.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND P.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND P.CRDAT BETWEEN #CRDAT2# AND #CRDAT# GROUP BY P.MANDT,P.PSPID,P.POSID,P.GUBUN,M.LIFNR -- HAVING MAX(CRDAT) >= #CRDAT2# ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( -- =============================== À±Ã¶ÁßBJN ¿äÃ» Äõ¸® Æ©´× 2 ============================================ SELECT X.MANDT, X.PSPID, X.POSID, X.GUBUN, X.LIFNR , SUM(X.B_PRO_R) OVER (PARTITION BY X.MANDT, X.PSPID, X.POSID, X.GUBUN) AS B_PRO_R FROM ( SELECT P.MANDT ,P.PSPID ,P.POSID ,P.LIFNR ,P.GUBUN ,SUM(P.PRO_R) B_PRO_R -- ,(SELECT SUM(P16.PRO_R) -- FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0116 P16 -- ,SAPHEE.ZPST0116A P16A -- WHERE P16.MANDT = P16A.MANDT -- AND P16.PSPID = P16A.PSPID -- AND P16.POSID = P16A.POSID -- AND P16.SEQNO = P16A.SEQNO -- AND P16.MANDT = P.MANDT -- AND P16A.GUBUN = '5' -- AND P16A.STATE = 'Y' -- AND P16.BELNR > ' ' -- AND P16.TAXDATE < #TAXDATE# -- AND P16.PSPID = P.PSPID -- AND P16.POSID = P.POSID -- ) B_PRO_R
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0116 P ,SAPHEE.ZPST0116A A WHERE P.MANDT = A.MANDT AND P.PSPID = A.PSPID AND P.POSID = A.POSID AND P.SEQNO = A.SEQNO AND P.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.GUBUN = '5' AND A.STATE = 'Y' AND P.BELNR > ' ' AND P.TAXDATE < #TAXDATE#
AND P.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND P.PSPID = #PSPID#
GROUP BY P.MANDT,P.PSPID,P.POSID,P.GUBUN,P.LIFNR ) AS X
) T2 ON T1.MANDT = T2.MANDT AND T1.PSPID = T2.PSPID AND T1.POSID = T2.POSID AND T1.GUBUN = T2.GUBUN AND T1.LIFNR = T2.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.MANDT ,T1.PSPID ,T1.POSID ,T1.TOT ,T1.LIFNR FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0100 T1, ( SELECT P1.MANDT ,P1.PSPID ,P1.POSID ,P1.LIFNR ,MAX(P1.CHGNO) CHGNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0100 P1 ,SAPHEE.ZPST0113 P2 WHERE P1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND P1.MANDT = P2.MANDT AND P1.PSPID = P2.PSPID AND P1.POSID = P2.POSID
AND P1.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND P1.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND P1.GUBUN IN ('10','11','12','20') AND P2.GUBUN = '5' AND P2.STATE = 'Y' AND P2.CNF_GBN = 'A' GROUP BY P1.MANDT,P1.PSPID,P1.POSID,P1.LIFNR ) AS T2 WHERE T1.MANDT = T2.MANDT AND T1.PSPID = T2.PSPID AND T1.POSID = T2.POSID AND T1.CHGNO = T2.CHGNO ) AS T3 ON T1.MANDT = T3.MANDT AND T1.PSPID = T3.PSPID AND T1.POSID = T3.POSID AND T1.LIFNR = T3.LIFNR ) T ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS M2 ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS M1 ,SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS M12 WHERE T.MANDT = M2.MANDT AND T.PSPID = M2.POSID AND T.POSID = M2.POSID_1 AND T.MANDT = M1.MANDT AND T.PSPID = M1.POSID AND T.MANDT = M12.MANDT AND T.LIFNR = M12.LIFNR AND A_PRO_R > 0
ORDER BY T.LIFNR,T.PSPID,T.POSID
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
